item.description:
﻿﻿I will be out of town during this concert, so it will not be an officially organized event.  I am posting it for anyone intereseted in attending:

Coro-Dante Spring Concert
All-Italian Repertoire Chorus of the Dante Alighieri Society
Kevin Galiè, M.M., J.D., Director
Mozart, Rossini, Donizetti, Verdi,
Traditional Songs & Madrigals
Sunday, June 10, 2012 5:30 PM
Dante Alighieri Society
41 Hampshire St, Kendall Square, Cambridge
Free admission… donations gratefully accepted
New members always welcome. Facebook: Coro Dante
Yahoo group: http://launch.groups.yahoo.com/group/CORO-DANTE/
Castelluccio, Parco Nazionale dei Monti Sibillini
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿
item.how_to_find_us: This is not an officially organized event

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Coro Dante Spring Concert
